metadata.description:
254-Pages!

Collects BOMB QUEEN: ROYAL FLUSH #1-4, BOMB QUEEN II: QUEEN OF HEARTS #1-4 and BOMB QUEEN VS. BLACKLIGHT: CAT FIGHT (one-shot)

The definitive remastered edition of one of the most outrageous comics of the 21st century! This special, super-deluxe hardcover features the first eight BOMB QUEEN comics, the first one-shot BOMB QUEEN special, plus behind the scenes features, stories and extras! For the discriminating ADULT reader (WARNING: hide it from yer mom!)
metadata.name: Bomb Queen Deluxe Edition
